0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR PROTECTION OF ARTISTS' WELFARE
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2018-09-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08234
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR PROTECTION OF ARTISTS' WELFARE
ABSTRACT : Aims to boost the morale of our Filipino artist by providing them legal, social and economic advantages and benefits to improve the quality of their life and compensate their sacrifices in enriching our Filipino culture, values and heritage. Provides for the artist’s accreditation; rights and privileges; SSS/GSIS, PHILHEALTH, and PAG-IBIG fund coverage; information assistance; and the role of the National Commission for Culture and Arts (NCCA)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-12
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (000 2018-09-21)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
